channel.title: Zombie sounds
channel.description: I noticed that they don't use their death sounds properly, might need to recompile the code & sound manifests. It's a low priority, but would be nice.

item.title: Zombie sounds
item.dc:creator: Blooper_Reel
item.description:
I think this also a good time to point out that zombies will still make idle sounds when they’re “asleep”.
